1: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> מִזְמ֗וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> לְדָוִ֥ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> שִֽׁיר׃ <sup>7892 </sup> <n>[and] Song</n> לְךָ֤ דֻֽמִיָּ֬ה <sup>1747 </sup> <n>waiteth</n> תְהִלָּ֓ה <sup>8416 </sup> <n>Praise</n> אֱלֹ֘הִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>for thee O God</n> בְּצִיּ֑וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>in Sion</n> וּ֝לְךָ֗ יְשֻׁלַּם־ <sup>7999 </sup> <n>be performed</n> נֶֽדֶר׃ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>and unto thee shall the vow</n>
2: שֹׁמֵ֥עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>O thou that hearest</n> תְּפִלָּ֑ה <sup>8605 </sup> <n>prayer</n> עָ֝דֶ֗יךָ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>to You</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> בָּשָׂ֥ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>unto thee shall all flesh</n> יָבֹֽאוּ׃ <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n>
3: דִּבְרֵ֣י <sup>1697 </sup> <n>act</n> עֲ֭וֹנֹת <sup>5771 </sup> <n>Iniquities</n> גָּ֣בְרוּ <sup>1396 </sup> <n>prevail</n> מֶ֑נִּי <sup>4480 </sup> <n>against</n> פְּ֝שָׁעֵ֗ינוּ <sup>6588 </sup> <n>against me [as for] our transgressions</n> אַתָּ֥ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>You</n> תְכַפְּרֵֽם׃ <sup>3722 </sup> <n>thou shalt purge them away</n>
4: אַשְׁרֵ֤י ׀ <sup>835 </sup> <n>Blessed</n> תִּֽבְחַ֣ר <sup>977 </sup> <n>[is the man whom] thou choosest</n> וּתְקָרֵב֮ <sup>7126 </sup> <n>and causest to approach</n> יִשְׁכֹּ֪ן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>[unto thee that] he may dwell</n> חֲצֵ֫רֶ֥יךָ <sup>2691 </sup> <n>in thy courts</n> נִ֭שְׂבְּעָה <sup>7646 </sup> <n>we shall be satisfied</n> בְּט֣וּב <sup>2898 </sup> <n>with the goodness</n> בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of thy house</n> קְ֝דֹ֗שׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>[even] of thy holy</n> הֵיכָלֶֽךָ׃ <sup>1964 </sup> <n>temple</n>
5: נ֤וֹרָא֨וֹת ׀ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>[By] terrible things</n> בְּצֶ֣דֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>in righteousness</n> תַּ֭עֲנֵנוּ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>wilt thou answer</n> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>us O God</n> יִשְׁעֵ֑נוּ <sup>3468 </sup> <n>of our salvation</n> מִבְטָ֥ח <sup>4009 </sup> <n>[who art] the confidence</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> קַצְוֵי־ <sup>7099 </sup> <n>of all the ends</n> אֶ֝֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> וְיָ֣ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>[upon] the sea</n> רְחֹקִֽים׃ <sup>7350 </sup> <n>and of them that are afar off</n>
6: מֵכִ֣ין <sup>3559 </sup> <n>setteth fast</n> הָרִ֣ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>the mountains</n> בְּכֹח֑וֹ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>Which by his strength</n> נֶ֝אְזָ֗ר <sup>247 </sup> <n>[being] girded</n> בִּגְבוּרָֽה׃ <sup>1369 </sup> <n>with power</n>
7: מַשְׁבִּ֤יחַ ׀ <sup>7623 </sup> <n>Which stilleth</n> שְׁא֣וֹן <sup>7588 </sup> <n>the noise</n> יַ֭מִּים <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of the seas</n> שְׁא֥וֹן <sup>7588 </sup> <n>the noise</n> גַּלֵּיהֶ֗ם <sup>1530 </sup> <n>of their waves</n> וַהֲמ֥וֹן <sup>1995 </sup> <n>and the tumult</n> לְאֻמִּֽים׃ <sup>3816 </sup> <n>of the people</n>
8: וַיִּ֤ירְא֨וּ ׀ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>are afraid</n> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>They also that dwell</n> קְ֭צָוֹת <sup>7098 </sup> <n>coast</n> מֵאוֹתֹתֶ֑יךָ <sup>226 </sup> <n>at thy tokens</n> מ֤וֹצָֽאֵי־ <sup>4161 </sup> <n>thou makest the outgoings</n> בֹ֖קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>of the morning</n> וָעֶ֣רֶב <sup>6153 </sup> <n>and evening</n> תַּרְנִֽין׃ <sup>7442 </sup> <n>to rejoice</n>
9: פָּקַ֥דְתָּ <sup>6485 </sup> <n>Thou visitest</n> הָאָ֨רֶץ ׀ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> וַתְּשֹׁ֪קְקֶ֡הָ <sup>7783 </sup> <n>and waterest</n> רַבַּ֬ת <sup>7227 </sup> <n>it thou greatly</n> תַּעְשְׁרֶ֗נָּה <sup>6238 </sup> <n>enrichest</n> פֶּ֣לֶג <sup>6388 </sup> <n>it with the river</n> אֱ֭לֹהִים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> מָ֣לֵא <sup>4390 </sup> <n>[which] is full</n> מָ֑יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>of water</n> תָּכִ֥ין <sup>3559 </sup> <n>thou preparest</n> דְּ֝גָנָ֗ם <sup>1715 </sup> <n>them corn</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כֵ֥ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>thus</n> תְּכִינֶֽהָ׃ <sup>3559 </sup> <n>when thou hast so provided</n>
10: תְּלָמֶ֣יהָ <sup>8525 </sup> <n>the ridges</n> רַ֭וֵּה <sup>7301 </sup> <n>thereof abundantly</n> נַחֵ֣ת <sup>5181 </sup> <n>thou settlest</n> גְּדוּדֶ֑יהָ <sup>1417 </sup> <n>ridges</n> בִּרְבִיבִ֥ים <sup>7241 </sup> <n>with showers</n> תְּ֝מֹגְגֶ֗נָּה <sup>4127 </sup> <n>thereof thou makest it soft</n> צִמְחָ֥הּ <sup>6780 </sup> <n>the springing</n> תְּבָרֵֽךְ׃ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>thou blessest</n>
11: עִ֭טַּרְתָּ <sup>5849 </sup> <n>Thou crownest</n> שְׁנַ֣ת <sup>8141 </sup> <n>the year</n> טוֹבָתֶ֑ךָ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>with thy goodness</n> וּ֝מַעְגָּלֶ֗יךָ <sup>4570 </sup> <n>and thy paths</n> יִרְעֲפ֥וּן <sup>7491 </sup> <n>drop</n> דָּֽשֶׁן׃ <sup>1880 </sup> <n>fatness</n>
12: יִ֭רְעֲפוּ <sup>7491 </sup> <n>They drop</n> נְא֣וֹת <sup>4999 </sup> <n>[upon] the pastures</n> מִדְבָּ֑ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>of the wilderness</n> וְ֝גִ֗יל <sup>1524 </sup> <n>rejoice</n> גְּבָע֥וֹת <sup>1389 </sup> <n>and the little hills</n> תַּחְגֹּֽרְנָה׃ <sup>2296 </sup> <n>on every side</n>
13: לָבְשׁ֬וּ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>are clothed</n> כָרִ֨ים ׀ <sup>3733 </sup> <n>The pastures</n> הַצֹּ֗אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>with flocks</n> וַעֲמָקִ֥ים <sup>6010 </sup> <n>the valleys</n> יַֽעַטְפוּ־ <sup>5848 </sup> <n>also are covered over</n> בָ֑ר <sup>1250 </sup> <n>with corn</n> יִ֝תְרוֹעֲע֗וּ <sup>7321 </sup> <n>they shout for joy</n> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>yes</n> יָשִֽׁירוּ׃ <sup>7891 </sup> <n>they also sing</n>
